description:
Minami and Sayuri race to the scene of Tsubasa and Reina`s date. After being moved to tears over the movie heroine`s story, Reina tells Tsubasa about her own circumstances. Tsubasa, having been reminded of his own situation, then tells her his story.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De la bonne viande entre amis
Minna de Yakiniku wa Namara Umai
Yakiniku with Friends Is Super Delish
みんなで焼肉はなまらうまい
